description: The SanDisk SD Card is a highly secure stamp-sized flash memory card.  The SD Card weighs approximately two grams. The SD Card can be used in a  variety of digital products, digital music players, cellular phones,  handheld PCs, digital cameras, digital video camcorders, smart phones,  car navigation systems and electronic books
title: SanDisk SDSDB-1024-A10 1 GB Secure Digital Card (Retail Package)
